EmailTemplate.name: Portal Welcome Message Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Portal Welcome Message Template 9 Debug 3 r2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome
Welcome to the Honeywell Customer Portal. This system was designed and built to meet the very real business needs of users like you.
Click on MyAerospace.com <https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/>, and open the door to a world of service and information. The Honeywell portal is your source for placing and tracking orders, checking service updates, online tutorials, upcoming events – and much more.
Of course, there are times when you’d rather contact <https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/wps/portal/!ut/p/b1/04_Sj9CPykssy0xPLMnMz0vMAfGjzOJDfU19LNxMTQz8zYKMDDw9zMwtwgy8jQ28TfULsh0VAVF3JK8!/> a Honeywell representative. And the portal will provide you with all the information you need to make that happen.
So try it for yourself. Then, tell us how it worked <mailto:aerocpscommunications@honeywell.com?subject=Welcome Aboard Feedback>. And help us build an even better portal for you.
